channel.title: Assassins snake
channel.description:
Well, i never unlocked the this by going through the game and playing it by cutting 70 peoples throats but there was a password released so you can unlock it so i decided to try it out and take some pictures with the in-game camera..
[img]http://thug-life.org/MGS4/AssassinsSnake.jpg[/img] [img]http://thug-life.org/MGS4/AssassinsSnake2.jpg[/img]
Ignore the Logo thing, its automatic on every picture you take with it. I've got some other different ones that i unlocked the proper way such as casual snake (Though you get that regardless once you complete the game i *think*)

item.title: Assassins snake
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

IIRC Ubisoft is the publisher, and their branches make the games.

item.description:

technically yes but its actually under a differencet branch of the company

Read full topic

item.title: Assassins snake

item.description:
@tL wrote:

And montreal are under ubisoft, so technically me saying ubisoft made it isn’t wrong.

item.title: Assassins snake
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:4, topic:226312”][quote author=casey. link=topic=297331.msg2389108#msg2389108 date=1218907020]
Is Assassin Creed made by the same company?
[/quote]
Haha ogod no, 'sif kojima productions would of made such a bad job of a game like assassins creed, ubisoft montrealmade assassins creed and Ubisoft published it. At the start of the game you are wearing that robe thing to blend into the rebel army, so kojima productions decided to put out a video with the snake wearing exact assassins creed clothing on april fools so everyone thought it was just a joke.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Assassins snake
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

casey.:

Is Assassin Creed made by the same company?

Haha ogod no, 'sif kojima productions would of made such a bad job of a game like assassins creed, ubisoft made assassins creed. At the start of the game you are wearing that robe thing to blend into the rebel army, so kojima productions decided to put out a video with the snake wearing exact assassins creed clothing on april fools so everyone thought it was just a joke.
